title: UNSUNG Gravel Film
content:
UNSUNG is a video tale that follows three of the unheralded heroes who make events like Unbound so special. Linda Guerrette, Michelle Duffy, and Wayne Smith all contribute in their own way to the gravel community. Whether in their role as a photographer, an event organizer, or rider support/mechanic, they all infuse their passion and incredible energy into the greater gravel collective. In doing so, they ensure the bright future of the sport…

See more at Shimano.

The post UNSUNG Gravel Film appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
